Features.Header: This file is used to track features being considered for development.

Feature.name: Correlated Funds
Feature.UserStory: As a user, I can find which ticker from a given sample most correlates with a target ticker or index so that I can decide which fund to use when trading the underlying index.
Feature.Example: Technical Analysis indicates that the Home Builders industry may outperform the market. Using this feature, I can find the fund which best tracks a Home Builders index, which itself cannot be traded.
